Also, any chance of there being a Dragon Rider spacecraft? I'll provide the Falcon 9 so you don't have to worry about that, but payloads for said Falcon 9 I'd prefer to use yours. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif ":P")

Well, I said I prefer realistic textures dosent means I dont like stock alike textures.

I feel slightly bad about being the necromancer on this one, but this mod is one that I use religiously due to ease of launching, and readily being able to swap out inventories for various missions and payloads. The trunks are awesome for the same reason the Dragon is, can be loaded with stuff to add to my stations and such. 

I'm with the idea that we wait till 1.1 drops for an update, rather then try for 1.0.5, since I've yet to find something broke in the mod.

Updated to 1.5.2, which is the same as 1.5.1 but uploaded to SpaceDock.  

Link on the original post. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)")
Have you made any progress since?
well⋯⋯this project needs some love![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif ":P")

Sorry, not yet.  

However, anyone using the 1.1 Beta of KSP, let me know if there are any issues. Obviously the KIS features will be incompatible, but if the parts cause any issues, please post them here. I don't have a Steam account, so I can't check it myself.

I will use and abuse the resupply ship immediately!

[@-ctn-](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/130898-ctn/), Mods installed: MechJeb, Mechjeb embedded, Phoenix CRS. Solar panels were getting 0.110 energy flow at an orbit of 100 km around kerbin at 0 inclination. Everything else is working. I can't check the KAS/KIS compatibility though.

On another install with more mods, I've got RCS firing in the VAB. Solar panels don't want to produce power even with full sunlight. I'm thinking it's an issue with another plugin, USI-LS has done this before to another mod.

When I get a chance, I'll test more of your mods.

[@-ctn-](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/130898-ctn/)Any chance of getting a manufacturer tab with your mods?
Yes, I plan to implement that in future updates.

New update to playing with your mod. None of the rcs on the MAV or pheonix capsules like rcs sounds (dunno what mod installed it). RCS thrusters have a thrust slider. It works.

I've been using the Phoenix capsules as dtone control pods, it's working pretty well tbh.
